website_summaries.verdict: With its towering lighthouse, range of cute characters, and many imagination-provoking ways to play, this set will hold a child’s attention for a long time to come.
pros: Construct a tall lighthouse, mini-island, watercraft, and more
Includes 2 mini-dolls, sea lion, dolphin, and other animals
cons: No surprise that a LEGO set this big is also a costly one

customer_reviews.title: Not in a box.
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI.. this is not put in a box! Just a sticker in the LEGO box. Ruined the surprise for my daughter, had to return it and get something else!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with label on the Lego box
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine but they just slapped a shippt label on to the Lego box and mailed it. This is the holiday time of year so having my child see the Lego box for her present was not great thinking. Little disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 6 year old's birthday gift and she absolutely loved it! The piece that goes in for the light actually lights up. Kiddo spent hours quietly putting this together so it is as much as gift for parents as it is for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda @ Literary Weaponry

customer_reviews.title: Definetly a "WOW!" Gift
customer_reviews.text: My oldest is into everything aquatic, so she loved this rescue center! The steps were clear and concise- well illustrated... no reading required. It took a little over 2 hours to assemble it. A lot of super cool features from the lab set, to fishing poles, moving whale sign, and much more... especially the LIGHT UP LEGO in the lighthouse :)
customer_reviews.author: Roy A.

customer_reviews.title: I am unhappy with the product delivered
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lego as a gift and it came in bad condition. open and all wrinkled. As it is lego I don't know if pieces are missing. I would like to know what steps can be taken.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Rey

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This set is absolutely adorable. Took my ten year old less than an hour to put it together. She luvs her Lego friends. We own most of them, this was one she didn’t have and it was on sale here at amazon for an okay price. Did not arrive on time, shipping was delayed with amazon which was the only disappointing part and why I didn’t give it a full 5 stars which is deserves.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Dust resistance factor huge!
customer_reviews.text: Like most other reviews, I agree this set has true 'play' value. We were very impressed with the quantity of sea life included and finding a favorite is impossible. This set also ties together other sets in our Lego world and in many cases for the 'friends' editions it breathes new life in some past sets that were too narrowly focused for extended play. The Amazon price beat all local store pricing by about $15, that is probably partly due to Alaska being a little removed from reality but regardless it was a terrific value!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and cute but build is not challenging like "boy" or "regular" lego sets
customer_reviews.text: like all lego its great quality, but all the friends set are way easier to build and require significantly less building skills than the "boy" lego. Lego underestimates a girls' ability or desire to have a fun built verses just a fun to look at play set.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: The right amount of complexity
customer_reviews.text: Our 9-year-old daughter thoroughly enjoyed building this. She found the instructions clear and was very content building this all by herself. She was so proud when she was finished!
customer_reviews.author: NewDay

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Lego Friends in this price range
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves Lego sets and has done a ton, including the these Lego Friends series. This is one of the best ones because of all the details and accessories. All the little rooms are outfitted well, there is a working light for the lighthouse, and it even has some additional pieces like the boat and island.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun lego set
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really ever read a bad "lego" review. Lego makes fantastic products (for what you pay, it better be good!). My daughter loves dolphins and was very excited to put this set together.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Lots to play with
customer_reviews.text: This Lego set has lots of parts and characters to play with. My grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Runyan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 7 year-old girl
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend's daughter, who is really into Legos. She was all about the set, which has cute animals and a rescue station. She spent the next day putting it all together, and sent me a video of the finished product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hyland

customer_reviews.title: 10-year-old Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old daughter received for a Christmas present. She loves it and gives it 5 stars! It’s super detailed and she loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: C Bass

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise with lighthouse
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set! My grand niece loved pylutting this together, and was tickled to find that the light works!
customer_reviews.author: expecthonestyinsellers

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really wanted this and worked with her older brother to complete it. Good bonding time. Neat set.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my daughter. Took her 3 days to fully assemble and she plays with it every week!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Denham

customer_reviews.title: Small but made our daughter happy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Small for the price but our daughter loved it
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. She put it together by herself. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Shurbee

customer_reviews.title: Cute set for kids that love ocean animals
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find in department store locally, and my 12 year old daughter loved to put this together and goes well with another set (turtle rescue set) that my younger daughter has.
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE M ESSAY

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute toy--great for imaginative young children.
customer_reviews.author: Bet

customer_reviews.title: ☺️
customer_reviews.text: My 9yr old LOVES LOVES LOVES this set! She was so happy to receive them for her birthday .
customer_reviews.author: amanda j sokol

customer_reviews.title: Another Great LEGO kit
customer_reviews.text: My sea turtle loving daughter wanted this set for her 8th birthday. She was able to assemble by herself without help.
customer_reviews.author: MommyDoWhat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Present for my 6 yr old daughter who absolutely loved it! She did the whole thing by herself. Fast delivery!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Santa was outed....
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered with a shipping label directly placed on the LEGO box - during the Christmas season. Think McFly!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mdddc

customer_reviews.title: A good set for 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 8year old daughter is a lego enthusiast and this was by far one of her favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy R.

customer_reviews.title: Love these LEGOS
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 and received this for Christmas. She was able to put it together by herself. She loves all the animals that are part of the set.
customer_reviews.author: HEIDI COMPSTON

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Instructions booklet
customer_reviews.text: This is a birthday present for my daughter. She is 6 and she can build it by herself. There are a lot of new pieces she doesn't have so she loves it. I have one problem for this set. That is the ripped instruction booklet. My daughter is disappointed and it is easy to mix up the pages. It is really disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with labels on the lego box and damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. But someone just put few shipping labels on to the Lego box and mailed it. No surprise for my kids... And the lego box was damaged. Very disappointed...first time to see packages like this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not disguised at all
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my child FOR CHRISTMAS and it was sent to the house in Lego Box. No disguising what it is. Way to help a mom out over the holidays, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Amundson

customer_reviews.title: came unboxed from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I had this checked as a gift and it was delivered as shown.
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this set
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge LEGO fan anyway but they knocked it out of the park with this one. The light up brick is brilliant and the details were incredible. My 13 year old who has five brothers and is intimately familiar with LEGOs was even impressed. She specifically mentioned that you could stick things to the seaweed (in other sets it's just decorative), and the fish, animals, life jackets, etc. This is an impressive set - you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Fun LEGO Set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes to build things and definitely likes a pattern to follow. These are great for her - the directions are pretty clear, but there are still lots of pieces so she doesn't feel like she's being spoon fed or things are being dumbed down too much. The colors are bright and fun, and the finished product is pretty cool, too. True to LEGO quality, the pieces all go together just right and there's no fidgeting. Now, sometimes you have to work to get things apart, but at least your project is sturdy, eh!? This is another fun set from LEGO and I am enjoying putting it together with my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: HobbitLyfe

customer_reviews.title: Whimsical and Interactive
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves the Friends Lego sets, and this one is no exception. The best things about it are the cute whimsical style and the highly interactive nature of it. Just about all Lego sets have some amount of cuteness, but this one ups the cute factor with the character designs and accessories. This set also really promotes play, with the cool light-up top, slide & water pool, disappearing map, jet ski, and characters. The set isn't hard to build but has enough pieces to provide quality building time. Highly recommended for kids that enjoy not only building with but also playing with their Legos. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Doggymcnuggets

customer_reviews.title: A great build for kids ages 8-12.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have 10 kids and as you might imagine we have a whole lot of legos in our home. We selected the LEGO Friends Lighthouse Rescue Center as a project from our girls ages 9 and 11. At 602 pieces this was a significant lego build for them. The 1st time they built it, it kept them busy for over 90 minutes. They have a whole village worth of Lego friends set and this new set has become one of the favored sets when they sit down to play with their "Lego friends." Rating: 5 stars. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Tabatt

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Set sent
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the Lighthouse Rescue Center but was sent the Pool Party Set instead. While legos are always great and being able to add the pieces to our collection is still nice, I do not like the premise of the pool party nearly as much as the Rescue Center. The Pool Party looks like the lego friends have a swim up bar. While I understand that they could be drinking smoothies, it still looks like they could be drinking cocktails and that is just not what I want for my kids. Wish I got the Lighthouse Rescue Center as it looks like a great set.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighthouse set
customer_reviews.text: My kids really enjoyed this Lego set. Though it is a large project, it is broken down into smaller ones, with the pieces and instructions for each part separate. The instructions were clear and easy to follow, and reading isn't necessary. The light brick works well and really adds a nice touch to this. There are multiple dolls, animals, and accessories included. All of the parts were present, and a Lego separator is included too. Great set!
customer_reviews.author: Happy  at Home

customer_reviews.title: Very cool animals in a fun lighthouse
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 6 year old daughter and found that she needed some help putting it together, so it became a project for her to do with her older sister. The build is a lot of fun with plenty of Lego surprises along the way. There are 5 seprate rooms here if you count the roof top and plenty to do to take care of our animal friends at the rescue center / hospital. It took them about an hour to build and has provided hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Lego fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute Lego set that was fun to build. The people are always my favorite part of every set that I build, and I LOVE the little people in this set. There are even animals in this set, including seals and a dolphin. This was a very easy set to put together, but it does have lots of little fiddly bits. I'd put it somewhere between beginner and intermediate in lego building skills needed to assemble this.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdy Narwhal

customer_reviews.title: Not Just the Fun of Assembly
customer_reviews.text: ... but of playing with the finished structure. My daughter received a Lego set (the castles, a pirate ship or two, and a good few other sets) every Christmas for about seven or eight years, and it was almost a tradition for us to sit down and put them together on Christmas Day. Alas, the child has long outgrown childish things, but this set offers a lot more scope for creative playing, once the assembly is done.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Fun and interactive.
customer_reviews.text: This lego set was fun to build. It came in 5 bags and had the main piece, plus 3 side pieces. My only complaint was some things that seemed like they should be in bag 1 were in bag 5. There is a water reactive map and an actual light up lego as the light house which is so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Erica K

customer_reviews.title: Such a creative set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is huge, with 602 pieces! We love Lego Friends in our house, and its our daughter's favorite. This set is nice, because there is a lot of structural building involved. It also comes with Emma and Mia. This set is nice if you have a child who likes to do imaginary play too, because of how interactive it is. This set does say 6+, so definetly for a more experienced builder, or with parent help!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set.
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say. LEGO is as great quality as it’s always been growing up. My teen started playing with LEGO friends when she was young and has since passed on all her sets to her little sister who enjoys them just as much. The Sea theme/water creatures is great. There are lots of little pieces but it’s fine for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: CHEezyMom

customer_reviews.title: So much play
customer_reviews.text: My son spend all afternoon putting this together and all weekend playing with it. I LOVE when legos do that! So much play for the money. The set itself Is beautiful and it was a fun, mild challenging build. The set also gives you a lot of cool, unique Lego pieces which is always a treat!
customer_reviews.author: MMay

customer_reviews.title: Another great addition to the friends line
customer_reviews.text: My daughter worked on the build over a few days. The set is not difficult to put together. The guide and separate make easy even younger builders. The light brick adds a nice touch to the set. Kid approved and 5 stars. Definitely recommend for any Lego Friends fan
customer_reviews.author: Customer Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: As a seaside theme to your LEGO village.
customer_reviews.text: This is great new addition to our LEGO collection. This is great for a seaside feel to your LEGO village. My son was single the theme song to a popular kids cartoon of a similar theme to this set. He seemed to like it more for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: rev

customer_reviews.title: Fun kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun lego kit that comes with some great special pieces. The kit is a bit more difficult than some other kits of the same size, but is easy enough for kiddos to do alone. The design is really cute and my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great set for all kids!
customer_reviews.text: This set is so cute and any kid that loves legos would love this set. It is geared towards girls but it’s not overly feminine at all and any kid would enjoy putting the set together and playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fun playset for your kids, especially girls. I like lighthouses so I thought it might help get my nieces interested in them too. For younger builders some adult supervision is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to collection.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson’s comments: Good time filler. All the pieces makes for fun in assembling the kit. Fits well with other Lego Friends kits.
customer_reviews.author: Tanstaafl

customer_reviews.title: Fun lego set to build!
customer_reviews.text: There's no hidden surprises here. If this set appeals to you, it is a quality lego set! Everything you'd expect from Lego.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Milo

product_meta.title: LEGO Friends Lighthouse Rescue Center 41380 Building Kit with Lighthouse Model and Tropical Island Includes Mini Dolls and Toy Animals for Pretend Play (602 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Let your kid get totally immersed in adventure action play with LEGO Friends 41380 Lighthouse Rescue Center playset. This rescue center toy has a multitude of features, including a lab, sea lion play area, rest area, TV room, office and an observation deck with a lamp that can be lit by pressing the lighthouse roof. Rescued sea lions access the LEGO lighthouse clinic using a clever hinged pool that swings through 180 degrees to bring the sea lions into the clinic. Also included is a water scooter for rescuing the sea animals and a mini island where the sea lion is trapped in an abandoned shack, which has a fun button function your child can push to set the sea lion free. There is also a treasure map hidden there—the clever textile reveals its secrets when brushed with water. This rescue mission toy provides a raft of scenarios that allow imaginations to run free and nurturing play to come to the fore. Give any LEGO builder an amazing building experience with Instructions PLUS, available in the LEGO Life app for smartphones and tablets. The easy-to-use, intuitive building instructions let them zoom, rotate and visualize their creation using the special ghost mode as they go. Instructions PLUS is also great for younger builders, guiding them through the building process for a greater sense of independence and achievement. This fun construction set includes 2 mini-dolls: LEGO Friends Mia and LEGO Friends Emma, plus 5 animal figures.
feature_bullets: Let the rescuing adventures begin with the LEGO Lighthouse Rescue Center, featuring a sea animal clinic, play area, TV room, office, look-out deck and water scooter, and slide then go on a rescue mission to mini island with the water-reactive map!
This creative toy playset includes 2 mini-doll figures: LEGO Friends Mia and LEGO Friends Emma, plus 5 animal figures including a dolphin, seal, and bird!
602 pieces – This animal rescue toy for boys and girls aged 6+ and for fans and kids of all ages makes a great gift for birthdays, Christmas, or other holidays
LEGO lighthouse model measures over 11 inches (29cm) high, 9 inches (25cm) wide and 5 inches (13cm) deep water scooter measures over 1 inches (3cm) high, 2 inches (7cm) long and 1 inches (4cm) wide
LEGO Friends Lighthouse Rescue Center 41380 buildable toy can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO bricks for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars450 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
